ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds large shrimp - peeled, deveined and butterflied
1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, sliced
3 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and julienned
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning, or to taste

cookingTips: If using wooden skewers, soak them in water for 30 minutes before grilling
Assemble brochettes so bacon and cheese cook evenly with shrimp
Grill over medium-high heat 3-4 minutes per side until bacon is crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Have you made skewered appetizers before? Would you like guidance on preventing cheese from sliding off or achieving crispy bacon?
